00037 #pragma pack(1)
00038 struct PWIZ_API_DECL PeptideDatabaseFormula
00039 {
00040     int C;
00041     int H;
00042     int N;
00043     int O;
00044     int S;
00045 
00046     PeptideDatabaseFormula(int c=0, int h=0, int n=0, int o=0, int s=0)
00047     :   C(c), H(h), N(n), O(o), S(s)
00048     {}
00049 };

00052 
00053 PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const PeptideDatabaseFormula& formula);

00056 #pragma pack(1)
00057 struct PWIZ_API_DECL PeptideDatabaseRecord
00058 {
00059     int id_ipi;
00060     double abundance;
00061     double mass;
00062     PeptideDatabaseFormula formula;
00063     int sequenceKey;
00064 
00065     PeptideDatabaseRecord()
00066     :   id_ipi(0), abundance(1), mass(0), sequenceKey(0)
00067     {}
00068 };
00069 #pragma pack()
00070

00075 
00076 class PWIZ_API_DECL PeptideDatabase
00077 {
00078     public:
00079 
00080     static std::auto_ptr<PeptideDatabase> create();
00081     static std::auto_ptr<const PeptideDatabase> create(const std::string& filename);
00082     virtual ~PeptideDatabase(){}
00083 
00084     virtual int size() const = 0;
00085     virtual const PeptideDatabaseRecord* records() const = 0;
00086     virtual std::string sequence(const PeptideDatabaseRecord& record) const = 0;
00087 
00088     virtual void append(const PeptideDatabaseRecord& record, const std::string& sequence = "") = 0;
00089     //virtual void append(const std::string& sequence) = 0;
00090     virtual void write(const std::string& filename) const = 0;
00091 
00092     // sortByMass() (rewriteStringTable)
00093 
00094     // iterator interface
00095     typedef const PeptideDatabaseRecord* iterator;
00096     iterator begin() const {return records();}
00097     iterator end() const {return records() + size();}
00098 
00099     // range access (binary search algorithms assume database is sorted by mass)
00100     iterator mass_lower_bound(double mass) const;
00101     iterator mass_upper_bound(double mass) const;
00102 };
